item.description:
Our October Meetup will be a Halloween Costume party for the Puggies from 11am to 1pm.... if you'd like to come in costume as well, please do so.

We'll have refreshments, games and an award for Best Costume.

For those who will be attending for the first time, we require proof of vaccinations for the rabies, distemper and canine cough. Anyone who'd like to schedule a grooming for after the meetup, please let me know.

I'm looking forward to seeing you all again and I hope we have a big turnout for this one!

Agni
item.name: OCTOBER MEET UP - HALLOWEEN COSTUME PARTY!!!!
